name: ConvertBar Auto Embed WordPress plugin
author: ConvertBar

sections.description: This plugin will automatically add the correct embed code for your ConvertBar to your website’s header.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. On activation, you will automatically be redirected to a form for in which you can place the embed code you where given. If you didn’t receive an embed code, just click the link below the form or contact our support team.
  4. That’s it! If you ever need to change your embed code, just go to Tools -> ConvertBar to update your code.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. On activation, you will automatically be redirected to a form for in which you can place the embed code you where given. If you didn’t receive an embed code, just click the link below the form or contact our support team.
  4. That’s it! If you ever need to change your embed code, just go to Tools -> ConvertBar to update your code.
